remarks: Value of the preimage mapping operator applied on a given random variable and constant (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Jan-2017.)
statement:
orvcval.1 $e |- ( ph -> Fun X ) $.
orvcval.2 $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
orvcval.3 $e |- ( ph -> A e. W ) $.
orvcval $p |- ( ph -> ( X oRVC R A ) = ( `' X " { y | y R A } ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d R y $.
$d X y $.
